title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JavaScript libraries to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3, and other large language models locally with GPU/CPU acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; npm install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama LLM, chat, and embeddings components to LangChain.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama models; runs in Docker or locally.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting and chat history for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that brings local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacements.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build a RAG system with Ollama, LangChain, and Chroma.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using a local Ollama model via Bolt framework.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot integration for chatting with Ollama models using discord.py.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI that connects to Ollama via the REST API.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module wrapping the Ollama JavaScript SDK for server-side apps.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate published to crates.io for interacting with Ollama.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package on pub.dev enabling mobile/desktop apps to talk to Ollama.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama distributed via NuGet with async streaming support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community-maintained Go client for Ollama published to pkg.go.dev.
